casebody.data:
GOOD SAMARITAN HOSPITAL, Appellant-Defendant,
v.
Roderick W. BRADY, Appellee-Plaintiff. Court of Appeals Case No. 49A04-1711-CT-2559 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED March 14, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

KIRSCH , J.

Reversed and remanded.

BAILEY, J., Concurs.

PYLE, J., Concurs.
